Platform Specific Details¶

Implementation of the MLI Library for the specific platform may put extra restrictions on data for optimization reasons or due to hardware limitations. This section collects such hints that need to be taken into account in addition to generic MLI API.

  • ARC VPX Specific Details
    • VPX Memory Allocation
    • VPX Memory Allignement
    • Accumulator
    • Operands Limitations and Shifting Ranges
